description:
Learn to make money online with your video camera professionally! We teach you how to shoot and compose great video so you can then upload your video footage online to sell as stock footage! All in an easy, step by step, in depth and fully interactive guide. Make money online pursuing your passion of video! Featuring advice, special tips and techniques, step by step video tutorials, and tested and used workflows.

This course has been produced to the highest quality by my very own media production company http://jmprocreative.com and is jam packed full of tips and tricks to get your video portfolio started!
title: Learn How To Shoot And Compose Great Videos
